title: Master Yi Regards
body: Im not sure whether AD master yi needs a nerf or....? The reason for this is he is so overpowered like too much damage early and late.  Also his Ad scaling is insane

i think he needs something little like more early hp or MR per lvl.
unless master yi gets a reset after his first alpha strike you should be able to focus him quickly.

Master Yi is actually quite an easy champion to deal with. As long as you survive the early-game Alpha Strike BS that comes along with the champion you should be able to hard CC and one hit him as soon as he makes an attempt to enter the fight.

Treat him like an ADC; if he makes any attempt to get too involved punish him for it and move onto the next target.
